keywords: Bolo jai milkar jai , Bolo jai Yesu ki jai

verse.name: v1
lines: Bolo jai milkar jai , Bolo jai Yesu ki jai
Bolo jai milkar jai, Bolo jai Yesu ki jai

verse.name: v2
lines: Man mere tu bolo sada, Hallelujah
Man mere tu bolo sada .. Bolo..

verse.name: v3
lines: Tere prem ke gaaye geeth, Hallelujah
Tere prem ke gaaye geeth.. Bolo..

verse.name: v4
lines: Jag me tera naam rahe, Hallelujah
Jag me tera naam rahe.. Bolo..
